#  On Climate and Energy Policy 

## Own Project(s):

### InCAP (Inequality Perceptions and Climate Action Preferences) 

  - 🙏 Funded through the [University of Bern, Faculty of Business, Economics and Social Sciences, Competitive funding scheme for young researchers with outstanding scientific qualifications](https://www.wiso.unibe.ch/ueber_uns/gleichstellung_und_nachwuchsfoerderung/foerdermassnahmen/kompetitives_foerdergefaess_fuer_nachwuchsforschende_mit_herausragender_wissenschaftlicher_qualifizierung/index_ger.html) 
 - 🔎 My research focus: Fairness perceptions and distributional preferences for domestic and international climate action, ITMOs, climate aid
 
## Research Consortias I am involved in:

- [SWEET EDGE](https://www.sweet-edge.ch/en/home/) (Enabling Decentralized renewable GEneration in the Swiss cities, midlands, and the Alps)
  - 🙏 Funded by the Swiss Federal Office of Energy ([SFOE](https://www.bfe.admin.ch/bfe/en/home/research-and-cleantech/funding-program-sweet.html/))
  - 🔍 My research focus: Policy acceptance of solar PV and building sector decarbonization 

- [SWEET SURE](https://sweet-sure.ch/) (SUstainable and Resilient Energy for Switzerland) 
  - 🙏 Funded by the Swiss Federal Office of Energy ([SFOE](https://www.bfe.admin.ch/bfe/en/home/research-and-cleantech/funding-program-sweet.html/))
  - 🔍 My research focus: Future climate and energy policy, efficacy, [serious games](https://github.com/brueckmann/CEGames)
